page.title: 12THE QUEENS VISIT
page.content: ON FRIDAY 3rd MAY 1985,BOZEAT SCHOOL WENT TO SEE THE QUEEN.SHE WAS VISITING STRIXTON,WHICH IS A SMALL HAMLET 2 MILES FROM BOZEAT. THE LAND IS OWNED BY THE QUEEN AND SHE WAS VISITING SOME ESTATE FARMS. WHILE WE WERE WAITING A POLICEMAN TOLD US TO LOOK OUT FOR A GREY GRANADA CAR WITH BLUE FLASHING LIGHTS.THIS WAS THE LEADING CAR AND THE QUEEN WAS IN THE NEXT CAR.HER CAR WAS BLACK WITH A GLASS DOME ON TOP.SHE SLOWED RIGHT DOWN,AND WE HAD A LOVELY VIEW.SHE WAS WEARING A BLUE DRESS.THE DUKE OF EDINBURGH WAS WITH HER.IT WAS A DAY WE WILL ALWAYS REMEMBER.LATER IN THE AFTERNOON THE QUEEN CAME THROUGH BOZEAT ON HER WAY TO HER NEXT ENGAGEMENT.
